text:
we have written an apache module to read the query string. In Apache 2.0.55 we
have no issues with the code attached.
In Apache 2.2, it reads successfully some 54 bytes which is equal to
r->remaining, but again goes into the loop and starts reading again using
ap_get_client_block, here it hangs. 
I tried to exit the loop if len_read == r->remaining, but I fear there are other
portions of the apache code, which waits for getting the current queue fully
read including EOS.
I read several articles but unable to get anything working, this information is
critical for my project. 
FYI. I am running the apache 2.2 binaries on Win32.
